game.name: Events Fashion Advisor
game.description:
Wow! You have got the biggest fashion project of your life in this brand new girls game. Hey woman! You cannot take a risk in saying no to this project since this time your client is no one but a very popular business lady. Come forward and be prepared to design the jaw-dropping looks for her for multiple situations including movie time, office day, business meeting, road trip and girls night in Events Fashion Advisor! You would find a huge collection of dresses and accessories in her wardrobe.

It is not going to be easy to create different outfits as per different scenes. But putting your fashion ability to the test can help make your way towards victory every time! Start with the movie time by giving your girl a red plaid shirt and pairing it with a black choker with a pink pendant and a pair of ripped jeans in this one of the best HTML5 dresses game! She loves to carry a loose blouse along with a midi pencil skirt and a beautiful purple handbag for the office.

Help your girl to pick up a green sweater with a white collar and combine it with a golden heart shaped necklace and a purple midi skirt for business meeting. For a road trip, she loves carrying casual outfits and a strapless blue and purple dress along with the elegant jewelry will look fabulous on her when she plans to go on the girls night program. Try to work on everything related to dressing and accessories to make her look elegant for each situation! Have fun for free without download on atmegame.com!
